name: Smartwool Merino 150 Baselayer Bottom - Men's
description: A micro-fine layer of warming wool to use as part of a layering system for skiing or climbing. They're also fantastic to pull under shorts on a brisk morning. Effective moisture-wicking and body temperature regulation is just part of what they do, all while having natural anti-microbial properties.Merino jersey fabric uses a nylon core to keep it durable.Merino lined wide elastic waist is super-comfortable.Stretch merrow seams lie flat and won't roll.
